altername_name: Scott Adams Adventure #10 - Savage Island: Part One
name: Savage Island: Part One
overview: SAVAGE ISLAND - PART 1 - WARNING FOR EXPERIENCED ADVENTURERS ONLY! A small island in a remote ocean holds and awesome secret. Will you be the first to uncover it? NOTE: This is the first of a larger multi-part Adventure: "it will be necessary to purchase additional packages to complete the entire Adventure.
